messages.content: You are a helpful AI assistant.
How many times a chthonian can attack per round?
Once
You are a helpful AI assistant.
How does a chthonian's attack with tentacles work?
Each of which cause damage equal to half the creature’s damage bonus (round down).
You are a helpful AI assistant.
How much damage does a chthonian's tentacles do to a target's CON each round?
3D10 CON
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What happens to a target if a chthonian's tentacles drain its CON to 0?
The victim dies
You are a helpful AI assistant.
Can a chthonian's tentacles drain one target while attacking another?
Yes, they could all attack the same one or each attack a different target
You are a helpful AI assistant.
How can a tentacle attack other targets while draining a victim?
It could still be used to fight-back, swinging the poor held victim like a ball on a chain at its attacker.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
Can multiple tentacles attack different targets or the same one?
They could all attack the same one.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
How does a chthonian determine the size of its crush area?
The crush area equals a diameter in yards of the chthonian’s SIZ divided by fifty.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the effect of failing to dodge, jump, or succeed with DEX in the crush area?
An investigator must succeed with DEX, Dodge, or Jump, or lose hit points equal to the creature’s full damage bonus.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
Can a chthonian hold and drain victims within its crush area?
Yes, it can continue to hold and drain victims that are already caught.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What determines the size of the crush area on a chthonian?
The chthonian's SIZ divided by fifty
You are a helpful AI assistant.
How does the armor on a chthonian regenerate?
5 hit points per round after wounded, but ceases to work when below 1 hit point
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the required percentage to successfully dodge a chthonian's attack?
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the damage dealt by a chthonian's thrashing tentacles?
2D6 (damage)
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the damage bonus of a chthonian's bulk, group attack?
damage bonus (bulk, group)
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What are the purported vulnerabilities of Cthonians according to the text?
The Vach-Viraj Chant, the Elder Sign, and total immersion in a body of water.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is a colour in the context of the text?
A sentient organism that manifests as pure colour.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
How does the colour move when it is present?
As an amorphous, glistening patch of colour, rolling and shining in shades of its pale colours.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What happens to a victim's skin and face when a colour feeds?
They glow with the colour.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the effect of the shaft of phosphorescence from the well on the characters?
It brings a sense of doom and abnormality.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the appearance of the entity when it moves?
an amorphous, glistening patch of colour
You are a helpful AI assistant.
How does the entity's presence affect Geiger counters?
a distinctive burst of radiation
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What happens to the victim's skin and face when the entity feeds?
they glow with the colour
You are a helpful AI assistant.
Can the entity be detected using today's light-intensification gear?
yes, it shows as a bright patch of lumin
You are a helpful AI assistant.
Is the entity visible or incorporeal?
incorporeal
